name: Clew
tag_list: competitive-intelligence, market-research, ci, humint, competitive-awareness, market-monitoring, research
overview:
Clew is a consulting firm that partners with some of the most successful companies in the world. We research and analyze organizations, markets, products, services, plans and people to inform the business decision making process.

Clew supports management disciplines ranging from HR, finance and legal to sales, marketing, operations and general management. Clew provides comprehensive consulting services through core Clew practices as well as on demand research services through ClewRaREâ„¢.

Clew also provides specialized training services in support of both primary and secondary research skills development. Please visit the links above to learn more about Clew and our services.

Over the years, Clew has partnered with global leaders like Fidelity, Microsoft, Koch, TEPCO, T-Mobile, HP, Mitsubishi and St. Gobain, leading consulting firms including Fuld, IDC and McKinsey, startup juggernauts such as Kana, Millennial Net, RSA and SupplierMarket.com, NFP’s like the Gates Foundation, the UAHC and NFTE as well as VC firms, PE funds and M&A advisors.

Clew has been recognized for its expertise by dozens of publications including The Wall Street Journal, Wired, Fortune Magazine, The Boston Globe, The New York Times, The Economist Group/CFO.com, USA Today, The Journal of New England Technology, Inc. Magazine, Competitive Intelligence Magazine, Chronicle of Philanthropy, Monster.com, and many others.
